publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7388 James Kelly: Rutherglen and Cambuslang Housing Association—That the Parliament congratulates Rutherglen and Cambuslang Housing Association on its recent 30th anniversary; notes that almost £45 million has been invested in housing stock in Rutheglen and Cambuslang since its inception and that currently 800 homes are rented through the association, which also manages 420 privately owned houses as well as 55 shops; congratulates the management committees both past and present, and wishes them well as they continue their work in the Rutherglen and Cambuslang area. Supported by: Patricia Ferguson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Elaine Smith*, Hugh Henry*, Karen Gillon*, Jackie Baillie*, Robert Brown*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Bill Butler*, Mary Mulligan*
